argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | mopnval.1 | |- J = ( MetOpen ` D ) |
| 2 | 1 | #P_mopnval | |- ( D e. ( *Met ` X ) -> J = ( topGen ` ran ( ball ` D ) ) ) |
| 3 |  | #P_blbas | |- ( D e. ( *Met ` X ) -> ran ( ball ` D ) e. TopBases ) |
| 4 |  | #P_tgtopon | |- ( ran ( ball ` D ) e. TopBases -> ( topGen ` ran ( ball ` D ) ) e. ( TopOn ` U. ran ( ball ` D ) ) ) |
| 5 | 3, 4 | #P_syl | |- ( D e. ( *Met ` X ) -> ( topGen ` ran ( ball ` D ) ) e. ( TopOn ` U. ran ( ball ` D ) ) ) |
| 6 |  | #P_unirnbl | |- ( D e. ( *Met ` X ) -> U. ran ( ball ` D ) = X ) |
| 7 | 6 | #P_fveq2d | |- ( D e. ( *Met ` X ) -> ( TopOn ` U. ran ( ball ` D ) ) = ( TopOn ` X ) ) |
| 8 | 5, 7 | #P_eleqtrd | |- ( D e. ( *Met ` X ) -> ( topGen ` ran ( ball ` D ) ) e. ( TopOn ` X ) ) |
| 9 | 2, 8 | #P_eqeltrd | |- ( D e. ( *Met ` X ) -> J e. ( TopOn ` X ) ) |
